title: Climbing for dollars
description: Climb the rope to reach the bag of money… if you can!
altHero: a man climbs a rope surrounded by razor wire and viscious dogs
alt1: man holds on to the rope with a stack of cash in his teeth
alt2: man stashes cash in his belt
alt4: a bag of flour drops and explodes on the man’s head
tags: game shows with a bit of danger!
